1337653415506112514.full_text: Primary school students in Handan, Hebei province paid tribute to victims of the #NanjingMassacre on Dec 11, as the annual national memorial falls on Dec 13. https://t.co/wDaSaNOOud

1337796445345206272.full_text: And every day after his retirement, he was praying for the souls of the victims of both armies, and was he really instructing the #NanjingMassacre?  (to be Continued

1337785845269446656.full_text: 伤过、痛过、哭喊过、挣扎过、迷茫过、愚蠢过…我们终于找到了自我拯救的方式，我们站了起来看着身上的伤痕和血迹，拍去身上的尘土，垒好破败的家园，房前屋后种上粮食蔬菜树苗花朵，过去我们俯身辛勤耕耘，现在我们仰望星汉天河。Memorial Day for the Victims of Nanjing Massacre #nanjingmassacre
